solution_line_template: {blue_percentage}% + {white_percentage}% = {non_green_percentage}% of the chips in the jar are not green.
So, {total_percentage}% - {non_green_percentage}% = {green_percentage}% of the chips are green.
There are {green_percentage}%/{blue_percentage}% = {num_sets_of_blue_percentage} sets of {blue_percentage}% to make {green_percentage}%.
Hence, there are {blue_chips_count} chips x {num_sets_of_blue_percentage} sets = <<{blue_chips_count}*{num_sets_of_blue_percentage}={green_chips_count}>>{green_chips_count} green chips.
